name: Catortionist
description:
You are James Pawnd, the greatest secret agent. Train to solve laser mazes in your simulator, because every move could be deadly.

In this puzzle game, you play as a contortionist cat moving through procedurally generated laser mazes. Each turn you must move or rotate your body (your torso must overlap in at least one cube that your torso or head was on the last turn!) and make sure no parts are being hit by deadly lasers. Try to make it through the mazes in as few moves as possible!

See any cool mazes? Let us know the game seed and your turn count in the comments below!

Lopar: Code/VFX/Gameplay

Michael Firman: Character Art. Illustrations, and Textures  twitter.com/michaelfirman

Ruinerr - Music/SFX

Font:
Orbitron by League of Movable Type https://www.theleagueofmoveabletype.com/orbitron

Open source projects:

Trackball Camera Godot addon (MIT) https://github.com/Goutte/godot-trackball-camera
Poisson Disc Sampling Godot addon (MIT) https://github.com/udit/poisson-disc-sampling
Unique Names Generator (MIT)  https://github.com/andreasonny83/unique-names-generator (used as a source of names for the in-game seed generator)

Created with the Godot engine
